product_name: Partners West Wild Edibles: A Practical Guide to Foraging
long_description: Featuring 60 edible plants found worldwide and 67 nutritious recipes, Wild Edibles: A Practical Guide to Foraging offers detailed instructions on finding and preparing edible greens.
short_description: Featuring 60 edible plants found worldwide and 67 nutritious recipes, Wild Edibles: A Practical Guide to Foraging offers detailed instructions on finding and preparing edible greens.
